dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training image processing systems. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images, each image being 28x28 pixels in size.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 50,000 training images and 10,000 test images. It is commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
I. Sutskever
G. E. Hinton
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset used for visual recognition tasks, containing millions of images across thousands of categories. It is widely used for training deep learning models.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
